st proceed to the scarf body section scarf body there will be no increases made in the scarf body or metal clamp each row will contain 19 stiches row 1 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet in each stich across row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each stich across row 3 you will be working all the fpdc around the half_double_crochet stiches located in row 1 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet in that stich and in the next 2 spaces fpdc around the 4th half_double_crochet in row 1 skip 1 space in row 3 half_double_crochet in the next 5 spaces fpdc around the 10th half_double_crochet row 1 skip 1 space in row 3 half_double_crochet in the next 5 spaces fpdc around the 16th half_double_crochet row 1 skip 1 space in row 3 half_double_crochet in the next 3 spaces row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each stich across 19 st row 5 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet in that stich and in the next 2 spaces fpdc around the fpdc below skip 1 space half_double_crochet in the next 5 spaces fpdc around the fpdc below skip 1 space half_double_crochet in the next 5 spaces fpdc around the fpdc below skip 1 space half_double_crochet in the next 3 spaces row 6+ repeat row 4 & 5 until you reach the 54
